Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red and Brown Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Red and Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
